column1: Neithan is Sindarin for "The Wronged" and was an alias taken by Túrin when he dwelt among the Gaurwaith.
The literal meaning of Neithan is "one who is deprived".
Neithan is a Sindarin word derived from NEK "deprive". Its Quenya cognate is nehtanō "one deprived
column2: exile whose rights and goods have been confiscated".
